divs: Sighting DetailsSaw Red Orange Orb Pulsating from work place in the sky. In the Northeastern direction from Atlanta. Glowed a bright red-orange light, stopped, and continued to hover. Light got dimmer and dimmer, until object disappeared. Saw two commercial jets fly by the object. Not sure if they were close to each other. I hope this helps. Please e-mail me if you have any more questions. Thank You!
Summary: Red Orange Orb Pulsating, Hovered, Stopped, Dimmed Light, and Disappeared.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around May 20th 2012
